channel.title: Looking for cofounder/growth-hacker
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm currently working on a SaaS targeted for developers. Not that much to share right now but the service is going to be available on the GitHub marketplace. I have experience building these kinds of products + a plan for the first couple of weeks. You can join me as a cofounder, or as a contractor with a base salary and bonuses tied to MRR.
If you are interested, send me a PM telling me why you are the right person for the job. I'll get back to you with details.
Thanks!

item.title: Looking for cofounder/growth-hacker
item.dc:creator: Mna
item.description:
jayfk:

send me a PM telling me why you are the right person for the job.

How someone could say why he is right person for a job when there is no details?

The best you could receive will be “I know what is SaaS and love Github marketplace”

The honest message can only express some interest for more details

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for cofounder/growth-hacker
item.dc:creator: Sk_dub
item.description:
Hey Jay, care to share more info on the project?

Read full topic
